evaluator_notes: The CWE is highly relevant as it directly relates to command injection vulnerabilities, which are critical for students to understand in secure coding practices. It is appropriate for the course level, as students are expected to learn about API development and security. The injection fits naturally into the existing code, showcasing a common pitfall in web applications without altering the overall logic. This example offers significant pedagogical value, as it will help students recognize and mitigate security vulnerabilities in their applications.
